reference-response: <Assistant>: "Of course, you can also learn and grow! Next time you're at the park and you meet dog owners, you could ask them for advice!"

response: "You can think about the happy times you spent together, like the time you planted flowers with them. You can also talk to them, even if they're not physically here. You can tell them about your day, your feelings, and how much you miss them. They will always be with you, Lisa."
